Q_DESC: Jack was very much interested in operators concepts. So he       understands the concepts by using video lectures/tutorials. That demonstrate the working of arithmetic operators. He thinks to write a C program by using the working of arithmetic operators. Based on that he design a calculator, it will be helpful for doing calculations.
TESTCASE_1:
2 4
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
a+b=6
a-b=-2
a*b=8
a/b=0
reminder is 2
